page.title: 08SHOPS, DONNINGTON,TELFORD
page.content: {The Parade}is a long strip of shops. The first shop is a fish and chip shop and the shop next door sells pictures, flowers and ornaments.Several shops sell food and drink - Liptons, which sells food and household articles,an off-licence,a butchers selling dairy products as well as meat,and a green- grocers.There is a chemist where you can also buy sunglasses,cameras and films.Bryants sells clothes,shoes and wool.There are also a newsagents and a Post Office. {The Co-op,Donnington. The Co-op opens from 9.00-5.30 on 4 days and from 9.00-8.00 on 2 days a week.We counted the people and there were 85 going into the store during half an hour.85*112=9520.From this we concluded that approx. nine thousand people visited the Co-op during one week.
